amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary by $24.7 million and to increase funding for the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase EPA/EPM geographic programs by $24.7 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 291 (Roll no. 655).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 291 (Roll no. 655).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Dold.
